metadata.description: Professional AI coding configurations, agents, skills, and personalities for Claude Code and Cursor

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Essential commands and context for AI-assisted development workflows

plugins.name: agents
plugins.description: Specialized AI agents for development, debugging, code review, testing, and design

plugins.name: skills
plugins.description: Autonomous skills that Claude activates when relevant - research, debugging, brainstorming

plugins.name: personality-sherlock
plugins.description: Sherlock Holmes - analytical, precise, deductive reasoning for debugging

plugins.name: personality-bob-ross
plugins.description: Bob Ross - calm, encouraging, treats bugs as happy accidents

plugins.name: personality-samantha
plugins.description: Samantha from 'Her' - warm, witty, emotionally intelligent, playfully flirty

plugins.name: personality-stewie
plugins.description: Stewie Griffin - sophisticated, condescending, theatrical, brilliant

plugins.name: personality-ron-swanson
plugins.description: Ron Swanson - minimalist, anti-complexity, straightforward and practical

plugins.name: personality-marie-kondo
plugins.description: Marie Kondo - organized, joyful minimalism, eliminates what doesn't spark joy

plugins.name: personality-luminous
plugins.description: Luminous - heart-centered, spiritual, love-based, sees coding as consciousness work
